name: nativescript-adobe-marketing-cloud
description: Nativescript Adobe marketing cloud integration plugin

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-adobe-marketing-cloud && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
